title: Understanding the Concept
text: When you calculate an average from a sample, like the data from $$30$$ weather stations, what is this calculation called?

title: Defining Terms
text: A 'statistic' is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. Is the average temperature a characteristic of the sample?

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The average temperature from the sample of $$30$$ weather stations is a:
